title: BLE-based Android App
description: An Android application developed using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) for real-time device communication. It features efficient data transfer, responsive UI, and secure pairing mechanisms. Built as part of an engineering internship to streamline internal device operations.

title: Diabetes Prediction using GANs
description: A machine learning project using Generative Adversarial Networks to generate synthetic diabetic patient data. Improved classification accuracy by 40% using advanced ensemble models and GNNs, and published a research paper highlighting performance gains.

title: Optimal Air Route Planner
description: A pathfinding system that recommends the most fuel-efficient air travel paths using Dijkstraâ€™s and Bellman-Ford algorithms. Achieved a 40% reduction in route computation latency while collaborating in a team-focused academic setting.
